message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCECONFIGURATION_XRV_EFFECTIVEDATE_MUST_BE_AFTER_TODAY
message.locale: The Effective Date,%1d, must be on or after the current date.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCECONFIGURATION_XRV_STATUS_SUPERSEEDED_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The configuration is 'Superseded', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCECONFIGURATION_XRV_STATUS_SUPERSEEDED_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: The configuration is 'Superseded', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCECONFIGURATION_FV_RECORD_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: Cannot Cancel the record, since its already canceled.
Cannot Cancel the record, since its already cancelled.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCECONFIGURATION_XFV_ATTENDANCE_REQUIRED_INDICATOR_SET_TO_YES_ATTENDANCE_TRACKING_ENABLED_CANNOT_BE_NO
message.locale: Attendance Required for Payment indicator is set to 'Yes' from, %1d, Attendance Tracking Enabled indicator cannot be set to 'No'.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCECONFIGURATION_XRV_PAY_BASED_ON_ATTENDANCE_TRUE_FOR_SERVICE_OFFERING_REPORTING_METHOD_CANNOT_BE_ATTENDANCE
message.locale: Reporting Method cannot be selected as 'Attendance' if the Pay based on Attendance is set to 'Yes' for the service offering.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCECONFIGURATION_XFV_REPORTING_METHOD_SET_TO_ATTENDANCE_DAILY_ATTENDANCE_CANNOT_BE_SET_TO_FALSE
message.locale: Daily Attendance Tracking cannot be set to 'No' if the Reporting Method is selected as 'Attendance'.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCECONFIGURATION_XFV_REPORTING_METHOD_NOT_ATTENDANCE_HOURS_ENABLED_CANNOT_BE_SET_TO_TRUE
message.locale: Hours Enabled can be set to 'Yes' only if the Reporting Method is selected as 'Attendance'.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCECONFIGURATION_XRV_REPORTING_METHOD_CAN_NOT_BE_UTILIZATION_AS_NO_MULTIPLE_SERVICE_DELIVERY_WITH_MULTIPLE_CLIENT
message.locale: Clients is set to 'Multiple'and Multiple Service Deliveries is set to 'No', Reporting Method cannot be selected as 'Utilization'.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCECONFIGURATION_XRV_STATUS_ACTIVE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The configuration is 'Active', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SOATTENDANCECONFIGURATION_XRV_STATUS_ACTIVE_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: The configuration is 'Active', it cannot be deleted.
